profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: Self-taught backend developer with 7 months of experience designing, developing, and implementing RESTful APIs. Specialized in Python with Flask and FastAPI frameworks, SQL database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite), and automation using Telegram bots. Focus on automated testing with Pytest and API documentation using Swagger. Fast learner and adaptable, oriented towards practical and efficient solutions.

experience.title: Personal Project Experience
experience.item_1: Full development of backend projects using Flask and FastAPI.
experience.item_2: Database implementation with SQLAlchemy and migration management with Alembic.
experience.item_3: Creation and implementation of Telegram bots for process automation, including lead capture and mass email sending.
experience.item_4: Design of a reusable universal authentication system for various projects (web, game servers, AI).
experience.item_5: Disciplined use of Git for version control, working independently.
experience.item_6: API documentation using Swagger and automated testing with Pytest to ensure quality.
experience.why_me: As a backend developer specialized in Python, I offer efficient and scalable solutions for your projects. My experience with RESTful APIs, SQL databases, and automation with Telegram bots allows me to quickly adapt to new challenges. I work with Flask and FastAPI, applying good testing and documentation practices (Pytest, Swagger). I stand out for my autonomy, fast learning, and commitment to quality. If you're looking for a responsible, proactive, and results-oriented professional, I'm the ideal choice to enhance your backend development team.

additional.will: Looking to join a team to continue professional growth and gain collaborative experience
